title: Baked Farro Pasta Recipe
summary: Baked Farro Pasta Recipe might be just the main course you are searching for. This recipe makes 6 servings with 425 calories, 18g of protein, and 10g of fat each. For $3.18 per serving, this recipe covers 25% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 1 hour. Head to the store and pick up garlic gloves, g farro tagliatelle, grain mustard, and a few other things to make it today. To use up the unsalted butter you could follow this main course with the Almond Milk Chocolate Pudding as a dessert. 284 people have tried and liked this recipe. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 87%. This score is excellent. Try Baked Farro Risotto Recipe, Cheesy Baked Pasta With Spinach And Artichokes Recipe, and Heather's Farro Recipe for similar recipes.
